RESUMO-CV.TEXTO-RESUMO-CV-RH: Mestre em Computação Aplicada com graduação em Ciência da Computação pela Universidade do Vale do Itajaí. Professor titular na Universidade do Vale do Itajaí com Experiência na área de Ciência da Computação, com ênfase em Inteligência Artificial. Pesquisador no LIA, Laboratório de Inteligência Aplicada, EMCT.
RESUMO-CV.TEXTO-RESUMO-CV-RH-EN: Master in Applied Computing and with graduation in Computer Science from the Universidade do Vale do Itajaí. Professor at the Universidade do Vale do Itajaí has experience in the area of Computer Science, with emphasis in Artificial Intelligence. Researcher at LIA - Laboratory of Applied Intelligence - EMCT.

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS-INGLES: In each academic period, managers of the majority of educational institutions work out in a manual and strenuous manner, the schedules of courses offered, trying to meet all the availability restrictions of the involved. In the scientific literature, this problem is called Timetabling, has a combinatorial character, and is mostly defined as belonging to the class of NP problems (for nondeterministic polynomial time). Through analysis of results obtained by heuristics applied in correlated works, a scheduler was developed for a course of computer science using the Tabu Search metaheuristic
